articles.description: Shares of Hindustan Aeronautics surged 6%, most in over a month, to a record Rs 2,579.95.
articles.content:
Shares of Hindustan Aeronautics Ltd. hit a record high after Antique Stock Broking cited a scope of rerating given its large order book amid India's quest for modernising its armed forces.

articles.title: IT stocks rise as companies express growth confidence - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Shares of IT companies have come under pressure this year on concerns that a deep slowdown in the US and European economies could constrain the scorching growth

articles.title: Sebi seeks details on startup valuation from PE, VC funds - Economic Times
articles.description: A propped-up valuation gives a rosy picture of the portfolio to a fund's investors and paves the way for the fund manager to attract more money from new as well as old investors when it goes for the next round of fund-raising.
articles.content:
